description:
ZIWO is Cloud Contact Center Software (CCAAS) that provides a straightforward solution for companies to talk to their clients with a crystal-clear voice. ZIWO has readymade plugins with most CRM and is integrable with any app.

ZIWO provides businesses with access to an industry-leading cloud contact center solution. The software includes advanced features such as call tracking, Virtual phone numbers in 150+ countries, Call Masking, End Call Survey, CDR, IVR, Real-time Reporting, and more.

ZIWO provides its solution to clients such as Tabby, Damac, Talabat, Deliveroo, Al Tayer, Floward, and many more.
description_enriched: Ziwo is a leading cloud-based contact center software company that offers scalable business phone systems, omnichannel solutions, workflows, and ziwo ai solutions. They help successful companies reach their customers from anywhere with a single interface that brings value in their conversations.

"Agentic AI represents a transformative force in the realm of customer experience. By leveraging AI-driven solutions, businesses can enhance customer interactions, improve efficiency, and build lasting relationships with their clientele. However, successful implementation requires careful consideration of challenges such as data privacy, maintaining a human touch, and integration complexity. As AI technologies keep evolving, businesses that use agentic AI will be ready to meet customer needs. This will help them grow and succeed in a competitive market."

What if your contact center solution actually understood your customers and your region?

ZIWO AI is built in MENA, for MENA. The only contact center AI solution designed specifically for the needs of businesses in the Middle East.

From Arabic dialect support (yes, it understands Saudi and Emirati!) to local data hosting, regulatory compliance, and full customization, ZIWO AI helps you deliver smarter, faster, and more localized customer experiences.

"Customer experience transformation turns every action the business adopts and implements into practical strategies that align with the customers' needs, wants, and demands. The concept is simple. Imagine you're sailing a ship and decided to direct it to a treasure island called the customer.

Any business concept has its values and core elements that represent the pillars on which it is founded. Similarly, customer experience has its competencies. 

Before applying any new policy, you should be sure that your team shares the same vision with you. The board or managing executives should believe in the results that will occur in case of a customer experience transformation. In other words, you should have an authentic 'Why' that triggers the board member and the whole staff. That's a common purpose that you inspire your team as a leader."

"Customer Experience Model Definition is a guide map that helps your business apply the values and competencies that are part of its culture in every customer touchpoint. It's a blend of what you believe your customers' personalities expect from the business and the unique value you aim to deliver.

A model in a business is like any engineering model or chemistry; it simulates a structure or a chemical equation that should be stable and fully balanced to achieve its goal. 

If you know what your customers like and dislike, you'll build an incredible path that enables you to discover more about your customers' touchpoints and help them achieve their goals."

Learn more about building a powerful Customer Experience Model in our latest blog: https://lnkd.in/dMh-e5x5
